text: Iye adati, “Ndithudi iye wakulakwira kwambiri pokupempha kuti nkhosa yako imodzi yokha iperekedwe kwa iye kuonjezera pa zimene ali nazo.” Ndithudi anthu ambiri ochitira pamodzi malonda ndi amene akulakwirana wina ndi mnzake. Koma izi sizichitika ndi anthu amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino ndipo anthu otere ndi ochepa. Ndipo Davide adazindikira kuti Ife tidamuyesa iye ndipo adapempha chikhululukiro kwa Ambuye wake ndipo iye adagwa nagunditsa mphumi yake pansi ndi kudza molapa
